channel.title: Omg server trouble?! wtf? OMFG SOMEONE BE BOTHERED TO HELP! (REWRD)
channel.description:
me and my mates were logged on my server yeah.... then it kinda like boom... it went off...? i tried getting on for like 10 minutes..... NOTHING -.-.....i restarted my computer..... i could get on that time..... because im on wireless.... these are the programmes i have to run
(mysource) > runserver > compile. (perfect compiler) > no-ip. DUC. > himachi > and moparscape.
that usually works u see....
but i loaded all them up... and my mates still couldn't get on..... so i restarted again.... and i still had the same problem???? huh???
please can anyone help me?

item.title: Omg server trouble?! wtf? OMFG SOMEONE BE BOTHERED TO HELP! (REWRD)

item.description:
@boarding_on_java wrote:

well you need to add the server port to your firewall folo mod taharoks tutorial guide for more info

item.dc:creator: @logging logging
item.description:
@logging wrote:

I HAVE IF U READ LOOK AT THE PROGRAMMES I RUN -.-

I DO THIS… IN THIS ORDER…

OPEN MY SOURCE… HIMACHI…NO-IP.DUC…COMPILE… RUNSERVER…MOPAR…AND NO-ONE AT ALL CAN GET ON BUT ME!
[center] Do not Type in Caps[/center]

item.title: Omg server trouble?! wtf? OMFG SOMEONE BE BOTHERED TO HELP! (REWRD)
item.dc:creator: @Danny15 Danny15
item.description:
@Danny15 wrote:

You compile before you runserver. And if it crashes check your runserver to see if it has any errors in it. And always keep hamachi on before you start your server,

Read full topic
